content: of cardiff cashmere classic held single cast on 55 sts using norwegian cast-on sample 3 pale blue working with 3 strands of yarn throughout 1 strand of lamana verona and 2 strands of lamana piura pulled from the outside and inside of the ball cast on 70 sts using norwegian cast-on start cast on your desired number of sts using the long-tail or norwegian cast-on method for a stretchy cast-on edge that is not too tight make sure not to work the edge sts too tightly to get a nice and even edge that does not limit the garter stitch panel as a little trick you will work a yo before the last st of every row 1 which will be slipped off the needle in the next row this prevents the edge from becoming too tight the trick is included in the instructions below
